title: Kepler Mapper: A flexible Python implementation of the Mapper algorithm
description: This is a Python implementation of the TDA Mapper algorithm for visualization of high-dimensional data. For complete documentation, see kepler-mapper.scikit-tda.org.

creators.affiliation: Leeds School of Business, University of Colorado Boulder
creators.name: David Eargle
